name: @npl/parser
description: A parser library for the Network Programming Language
author: Martin Halliday

scripts.generate:buildinfo: echo 'export default { version: "'$npm_package_version'", date: new Date('$(date +%s)'000) }' > ./src/buildInfo.ts
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:buildinfo
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run compile
